description: Send an e-mail using SMTP credentials
label: Send Email via SMTP

options.name: host
options.label: Hostname
options.info: The hostname of the SMTP server you want to use

options.name: port
options.label: Port
options.info: The port number of the SMTP server you want to use

options.name: username
options.label: Username
options.info: The username of the SMTP server you want to use

options.name: password
options.label: Password
options.info: The password of the SMTP server you want to use

options.name: secure
options.label: Secure?
options.info: if true the connection will use TLS when connecting to server. If false (the default) then TLS is used if server supports the STARTTLS extension. In most cases set this value to true if you are connecting to port 465. For port 587 or 25 keep it false

options.name: senderEmail
options.label: Sender E-mail
options.info: The email address of the sender

options.name: senderName
options.label: Sender Name
options.info: The display name of the sender

options.name: toEmail
options.label: Recipient
options.info: The email address of the recipient

options.name: body
options.label: Body Template
options.info: The HTML body of the email
Select all the variables you want to have available in the template with a key
options.label: Template Variables
options.name: variables
result
options.label: As
options.info: The resulting greet to the world.
